name: typescript-node-aws-template
description: A simple template repository for running transpiled typescript node.js code as an AWS lambda (Full example included)
author: Miidoriya

scripts.build:zip: npm run build && cd build && zip -r index.zip index.js*
scripts.release:terraform: npm run build:zip && cd infra/examples/typescript-node-lambda && terraform init -upgrade && terraform apply
